1-0.intent: Global path to initialize the book manager.
1-0.name: global

1-1.intent: Accept the book and return the name and genre.
1-1.name: Accept Book Information

1-1-3.intent: Prompt and accept for book genre.

1-1-4.intent: Create a book with name <name> with genre <genre>.

1-2-5-3.intent: Check if the user chose to add a book.

1-2-5-3-2.intent: Add book named <name> with genre <genre> to basket.

1-2-5-4.intent: Check if the user chose to place a book on the shelf.

1-2-5-4-1.intent: Send task to add basket to shelf to bookshelf thread.

1-2-5-5.intent: Check if the user chose to place a display the bookshelf and basket.

1-2-5-5-1.intent: Send task to display basket and bookshelf to bookshelf thread.

1-2-5-6-1.intent: Send task to tell bookshelf thread to terminate.

2-0.intent: Global path for the bookshelf thread module.
2-0.name: global

2-0-2.intent: Define the BookShelfThread class that runs in its own thread.

2-1.intent: Initialize the BookShelfThread with an empty bookshelf and a queue, then start the thread.
2-1.name: Initialize BookShelfThread

2-1-1.intent: Initialize the base Thread class with daemon mode disabled.

2-1-2.intent: Create an empty bookshelf to store books grouped by first letter.

2-1-3.intent: Store the incoming queue to receive tasks from the main thread

2-1-4.intent: Start the thread so that the book shelf manager starts.

2-2.intent: Log that the bookshelf thread is terminating when the object is destroyed.
2-2.name: Terminate BookShelfThread

2-2-1.intent: Print a termination message for the bookshelf thread.

2-3.intent: Place all books from the basket onto the bookshelf grouped by the first letter of the book name.
2-3.name: Place Books On Shelf From Basket

2-3-1.intent: Iterate while there are still books in the basket.

2-3-1-1.intent: Remove the next book from the basket.

2-3-1-2.intent: Log that the book was accepted along with its name and genre.

2-3-1-3.intent: Get the first letter of the book's name to determine the shelf slot.

2-3-1-4.intent: Check whether a shelf slot already exists for this first letter.

2-3-1-4-1.intent: Create a new shelf slot for this first letter.

2-3-1-5.intent: Handle the case where the shelf slot already exists.

2-3-1-5-1.intent: Log that a shelf slot for this first letter already exists.

2-3-1-6.intent: Add the book's name to the appropriate shelf slot.

2-4.intent: Process messages from the queue and update or display the bookshelf based on the message type.
2-4.name: Run Book Shelf Thread Loop

2-4-1.intent: Keep processing messages from the queue until told to quit.

2-4-1-1.intent: Check whether there is a message available in the queue.

2-4-1-1-1.intent: Retrieve the next message from the queue with a timeout.

2-4-1-1-2.intent: Check if the message requests books to be added from the basket to the shelf.

2-4-1-1-2-1.intent: Place books from the basket onto the shelf according to the message.

2-4-1-1-3.intent: Check if the message requests the current bookshelf and basket to be displayed.

2-4-1-1-3-1.intent: Print the current state of the bookshelf.

2-4-1-1-3-2.intent: Print the current contents of the basket that was sent with the message.

2-4-1-1-4.intent: Check if the message requests this thread to quit.

2-4-1-1-4-1.intent: Break out of the loop and end the thread run method.
